name: PIP Action Campaign
goal: PIP Action Campaign is an international social networking group of women exposed to and affected by banned PIP implants.
interests: Consumers, Environment, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Women's Health
Women's Rights
REACH & Chemical regulation of contaminants found in PIP implants
Endocrine Disruptor Chemical regulation
Medical Devices Regulation
Corruption in the healthcare sector
Regulatory authorities including Notified Bodies & Competent Authorities
Mothers' Health
Breast Implant Cancer
Cosmetic Surgery Interventions
Chemical Regulation
Cancer prevention and treatment through Medical Research
Public Health Crises in implantable medical devices
Funding Public Health Crises
